name: Mathematics Quiz
introduction: Welcome to the Mathematics Quiz! This AI-graded quiz aims to test your math skills in a fun and interactive way.

exercises.question: Write a brief note about the significance of the Pythagoras theorem in mathematics.

criteria.description: The learner provides a basic description of the Pythagoras theorem.
The learner's response is clear, accurate, and easy to understand with a good writing style.

The repository is fully accessible and relevant to the assignment.
